script_text: Happy Birthday, Capricorn! Born on January 5th, you carry the energy of the disciplined mountain climber. This year marks a significant career milestone for you. Your hard work is about to pay off in a way you didn't expect. Spiritually, focus on grounding yourself. A sudden travel opportunity in March will change your perspective.
